entry.body:
import Details from "@w/Details.astro";
import TradingView from "@w/TradingView.astro";
import TabMenu from "@w/TabMenu.astro";
import TabData from "@w/TabData.astro";

## Information

BNB Token

---

<TabMenu first="chart" data={["settings", "options", "exchange", "reports", "notes"]}>
  <TabData tail="block" data="chart">
    <TradingView data="BINANCE:BNBUSD" />
  </TabData>
  <TabData data="settings">Settings</TabData>
  <TabData data="options">Options</TabData>
  <TabData data="exchange">Exchanges</TabData>
  <TabData data="reports">Reports</TabData>
  <TabData data="notes">

## Notes

These are the collection of notes for the BNB MDX Document.

### Log

- [x] Add Charts for BNB Token
- [ ] Add tabs with charts!
- [ ] Multi Currency support for Charts?

#### Journal

<Details data="2023-04-14">Adding the BNB Token</Details>
</TabData>
</TabMenu>

data.title: Binance Coin
data.description: BNB token is the native coin of Binance Chain, which is the blockchain platform of Binance, the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the world. The BNB token can be used for various purposes such as paying for fees, participating in token sales, staking, lending, spending and sending crypto.
data.author: KBVE Team
